interface.name: org.alljoyn.SmartSpaces.Environment.CurrentTemperature
interface.description: This interface provides capability to represent current temperature.

property.name: Precision
property.description: The precision of the CurrentValue property. i.e. the number of degrees Celsius the actual power consumption must change before CurrentValue is updated.

property.name: UpdateMinTime
property.description: The minimum time between updates of the CurrentValue property in milliseconds.
